column4: when I do apt-get update, I get this error--> GPG error: http://us.archive.ubuntu.com breezy-updates Release: The following signatures were invalid: BADSIG 40876EAF435D05B5 Ubuntu Archive Automatic Signing Key <ftpmaster@ubuntu.com>, what can I do to fix this ?
its ok dont worry about it
it still updates right?
I havent had any new updates for at least a week with breezy, is this normal ?
i was down for over 2 weeks so im not sure what there was
can you run sudo apt-get upgrade?
yeah that doesnt give me any error.. but there is nothing to upgrade
is that the only repo causing issues?
yes
ok just a sec
http://pastebin.com/428420
I didn't manually edit it.. I just added universe multiverse from synaptic
it looks like your universe is commented out
take the # away from the universe repos
I did and still get the same error
you saved it than ran sudo apt-get update?
yes
W: GPG error: http://us.archive.ubuntu.com breezy-updates Release: The following signatures wer e invalid: BADSIG 40976EAF437D05B5 Ubuntu Archive Automatic Signing Key <ftpmaster@ubuntu.com>
give me a min to set mine up and ill give you a copy of mine to replace yours i have no errors
I think it might be authentification key problem ?
I get the same error
follow instructions that ubotu gave you
that should clear it up
